name: Unveiled (itch)
description:
A memory platform game, discover a new way to find the path...

Just use your arrows keys to move and space to jump and reset level, enjoy it.

I'm learning Unity so maybe it is not so good enough I wish but the idea is in development...

So, many of graphics, sound and assets are from google search so my intent is not to profit just to learn and listen your appreciations
